unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at Infosys see great potential in fresh graduates from IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Our recruitment drive starts 10/10/2024. We'll be offering packages starting from Rs. 8 Lakhs. Interviews will be held on 15/10/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Looking forward to welcoming bright minds! Apply before 05/10/2024. Good luck to all applicants. Diwali bonuses await!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at I N F O S Y S see great potential in fresh graduates from I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Our recruitment drive starts tenth October two thousand and twenty four. We will be offering packages starting from rupees eight lakhs. Interviews will be held on fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four at ten zero zero hours. Looking forward to welcoming bright minds! Apply before fifth October two thousand and twenty four. Good luck to all applicants. Diwali bonuses await!
